trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While Lifferlas remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal tree.

trait.name: Roleplaying Information
entries: A druid of the Emerald Enclave awakened the tree Lifferlas with a spell. Goldenfields is his home, its people his friends. Children like to carve their name and initials into his body and hang from his boughs, and he's happy with that.
Ideal: "I exist to protect the people and plants of Goldenfields."
Bond: "Children are wonderful. I would do anything to make them feel happy and safe."
Flaw: "I can't remember people's names and often get them mixed up."

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.
